dependencies.description: The free and opensource java implementation
dependencies.name: java

dependencies.description: The free and opensource java implementation
dependencies.name: openjdk

description:
The standard Java libraries fail to provide enough methods for
manipulation of its core classes. Apache Commons Lang provides these
extra methods. Lang provides a host of helper utilities for the
java.lang API, notably String manipulation methods, basic numerical
methods, object reflection, concurrency, creation and serialization and
System properties. Additionally it contains basic enhancements to
java.util.Date and a series of utilities dedicated to help with building
methods, such as hashCode, toString and equals.
name: commons-lang3

variants.description: Build systems supported by the package
variants.name: build_system
